quote: Anger is the enemy of non-violence and pride is a monster that swallows it up.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: Anger as soon as fed is dead Tis starving makes it fat.
author: Emily Dickinson

quote: Anger is an acid that can do more harm to the vessel in which it is stored than to anything on which it is poured.
author: Mark Twain

quote: Your anger is a gift.
author: Zack de la Rocha

quote: Whatever is begun in anger ends in shame.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Fear is the only true enemy, born of ignorance and the parent of anger and hate.
author: Edward Albert

quote: If you are patient in one moment of anger, you will escape a hundred days of sorrow.
author: Chinese Proverb

quote: The tendency of aggression is an innate, independent, instinctual disposition in man... it constitutes the most powerful obstacle to culture.
author: Sigmund Freud

quote: A man who has never made a woman angry is a failure in life.
author: Christopher Morley

quote: In times of great stress or adversity, it's always best to keep busy, to plow your anger and your energy into something positive.
author: Lee Iacocca

quote: He is a fool who cannot be angry; but he is a wise man who will not.
author: English Proverb

quote: The greatest remedy for anger is delay.
author: Seneca

quote: Men in rage strike those that wish them best.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: Anyone can become angry - that is easy. But to be angry with the right person, to the right degree, at the right time, for the right purpose, and in the right way; this is not easy.
author: Aristotle

quote: When you meet up with a disagreeable person, never allow yourself to be upset. Say to yourself,  if a dowdy like that can stand himself all his life, surely I can stand him for a few minutes.
author: Source Unknown

quote: There was never an angry man that thought his anger unjust.
author: Saint Francis de Sales

quote: Anger is a wind which blows out the lamp of the mind.
author: Robert Green Ingersoll

quote: In a controversy the instant we feel anger we have already ceased striving for the truth, and have begun striving for ourselves.
author: Gautama Buddha

quote: A man that studieth revenge keeps his own wounds green.
author: Francis Bacon

quote: For every minute you are angry you lose sixty seconds of happiness.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: I am angry nearly every day of my life, but I have learned not to show it; and I still try to hope not to feel it, though it may take me another forty years to do it. [Character of Marmee in Little Women]
author: Louisa May Alcott

quote: He who angers you conquers you.
author: Elizabeth Kenny

quote: An angry man is again angry with himself when he returns to reason.
author: Publilius Syrus

quote: Anger is a momentary madness, so control your passion or it will control you.
author: G. M. Trevelyan

quote: The best answer to anger is silence.
author: German Proverb

quote: Heaven has no rage like love to hatred turned, nor hell a fury like a woman scorned.
author: William Congreve

quote: When angry count to ten before you speak. If very angry, count to one hundred.
author: Thomas Jefferson

quote: The fiend in his own shape is less hideous than when he rages in the breast of man.
author: Nathaniel Hawthorne

quote: One of the best ways of keeping your temper in an argument, as most of us know only too well, is not to listen to anything the other person has to say.
author: Alice Miller

quote: Conflict is the gadfly of thought. It stirs us to observation and memory. It instigates to invention. It shocks us out of sheeplike passivity, and sets us at noting and contriving.
author: John Dewey

quote: Meanness is incurable; it cannot be cured by old age, or by anything else.
author: Aristotle

quote: It is wise to direct your anger towards problems - not people to focus your energies on answers - not excuses.
author: William Arthur Ward

quote: No one is as angry as the person who is wrong.
author: Proverbs

quote: Anger is never without a reason, but seldom with a good one.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Holding on to anger, resentment and hurt only gives you tense muscles, a headache and a sore jaw from clenching your teeth. Forgiveness gives you back the laughter and the lightness in your life.
author: Joan Lunden

quote: Anger is an expensive luxury in which only men of certain income can indulge.
author: George William Curtis

quote: Man should forget his anger before he lies down to sleep.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: Reproach is infinite, and knows no end  So voluble a weapon is the tongue;  Wounded, we wound; and neither side can fail For every man has equal strength to rail.
author: Homer

quote: Angry men are blind and foolish, for reason at such time takes flight and, in her absence; wrath plunders all the riches of the intellect, while the judgment remains the prisoner of its own pride.
author: Pietro Aretino

quote: Guilt is anger directed at ourselves - at what we did or did not do. Resentment is anger directed at others - at what they did or did not do.
author: Peter McWilliams

quote: Anger is the feeling that makes your mouth work faster than your mind.
author: Author

quote: Grab the broom of anger and drive off the beast of fear.
author: Zora Neale Hurston

quote: Anger is a short madness.
author: Horace

quote: In our daily life, we encounter people who are angry, deceitful, intent only on satisfying their own needs. There is so much anger, distrust, greed, and pettiness that we are losing our capacity to work well together.
author: Margaret J. Wheatley

quote: Many people lose their tempers merely from seeing you keep yours.
author: Frank Moore Colby

quote: Words can be said in bitterness and anger, and often there seems to be an element of truth in the nastiness. And words don't go away, they just echo around.
author: Jane Goodall

quote: Let us not look back in anger, nor forward in fear, but around in awareness.
author: James Thurber

quote: How much more grievous are the consequences of anger than the causes of it.
author: Marcus Aurelius

quote: Generally speaking, if a human being never shows anger, then I think something's wrong. He's not right in the brain.
author: Dalai Lama

quote: We are losing sight of civility in government and politics. Debate and dialogue is taking a back seat to the politics of destruction and anger and control. Dogma has replaced thoughtful discussion between people of differing views.
author: James McGreevey

quote: I guess because I had such a horrible life growing up, going from place to place not knowing what I was gonna do and ending up being homeless, there was a lot of pain and a lot of anger that was coming out through my guitar playing.
author: Dave Mustaine

quote: So I'm not worried about the emotions I carry with me, because I'm happy that I have them; I think it's good for the work I do. The emotions that are not healthy are the ones you hold inside, like anger.
author: Diana Ross

quote: Two things a man should never be angry at: what he can help, and what he cannot help.
author: Thomas Fuller

quote: Allowing children to show their guilt, show their grief, show their anger, takes the sting out of the situation.
author: Martha Beck

quote: The worst tempered people I have ever met were those who knew that they were wrong.
author: Wilson Mizner

quote: I have not lost faith in God. I have moments of anger and protest. Sometimes I've been closer to him for that reason.
author: Elie Wiesel

quote: Lawyers are men who hire out their words and anger.
author: Horace

quote: The opposite of anger is not calmness, its empathy.
author: Mehmet Oz

quote: He took over anger to intimidate subordinates, and in time anger took over him.
author: Milan Kundera

quote: All those who offer an opinion on any doubtful point should first clear their minds of every sentiment of dislike, friendship, anger or pity.
author: Sallust

quote: Anger swirled in him a tempest readying her strike. And like a helpless vessel caught in her fury he felt himself dashed against the rocks without mercy.
author: V.S. Carnes

quote: A man is about as big as the things that make him angry.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: Never forget what a man has said to you when he was angry. If he has charged you with anything, you had better look it up.
author: Henry Ward Beecher

quote: Violence in the voice is often only the death rattle of reason in the throat.
author: John F. Boyes

quote: Forgiveness is the economy of the heart... forgiveness saves the expense of anger, the cost of hatred, the waste of spirits.
author: Hannah More

quote: Anger, if not restrained, is frequently more hurtful to us than the injury that provokes it.
author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quote: We're taught to be ashamed of confusion, anger, fear and sadness, and to me they're of equal value to happiness, excitement and inspiration.
author: Alanis Morissette

quote: I may have been the only candidate in America who failed to ride the wave of anti-establishment anger to victory.
author: Mickey Kaus

quote: Nothing does reason more right, than the coolness of those that offer it: For Truth often suffers more by the heat of its defenders, than from the arguments of its opposers.
author: William Penn

quote: I turned to music originally because of my past and needing a release or an outlet to get out anger or frustration or hurt.
author: Christina Aguilera

quote: ... all his faces were designed to express rage or loathing. Now that something had happened which really deserved a face, he had none to celebrate it with. As a kind of token, he made his Sex Life in Ancient Rome face.
author: Kingsley Amis

quote: Anger is not only inevitable, but it is necessary. For in its place is indifference, the worst of all human qualities.
author: Anonymous

quote: The intoxication of anger, like that of the grape, shows us to others, but hides us from ourselves.
author: John Dryden

quote: What if you threw a protest and no one showed up? The lack of angst and anger and emotion is a big positive.
author: Jay Alan Sekulow

quote: A man that studieth revenge keeps his own wounds green.
author: Francis Bacon

quote: It's a very difficult thing for people to accept, seeing women act out anger on the screen. We're more accustomed to seeing men expressing rage and women crying.
author: Rebecca De Mornay

quote: When I am angry I can pray well and preach well.
author: Martin Luther

quote: As a culture I see us as presently deprived of subtleties. The music is loud, the anger is elevated, sex seems lacking in sweetness and privacy.
author: Shelley Berman

quote: Good satire comes from anger. It comes from a sense of injustice, that there are wrongs in the world that need to be fixed. And what better place to get that well of venom and outrage boiling than a newsroom, because you're on the front lines.
author: Carl Hiaasen

quote: When you learn that a truth is a lie, anger follows.
author: Grace Slick

quote: It is impossible for you to be angry and laugh at the same time. Anger and laughter are mutually exclusive and you have the power to choose either.
author: Wayne Dyer

quote: The preparation, commitment and desire to win will be no less than the last time I drove a grand prix car in anger.
author: Nigel Mansell

quote: Life is precious and there's not a lot of room for anger.
author: Fran Drescher

quote: When angry, count four. When very angry, swear.
author: Mark Twain

quote: Holding on to anger is like grasping a hot coal with the intent of throwing it at someone else; you are the one who gets burned.
author: Gautama Buddha

quote: I did not think that I was angry, but clearly anger was reflected in my writing. I did not think that I had been affected emotionally, but it was clear from my writing that I was still very emotional about the trial some six months after it ended.
author: Christopher Darden

quote: Anger blows out the lamp of the mind. In the examination of a great and important question, everyone should be serene, slow-pulsed and calm.
author: Robert G. Ingersoll

quote: It isn't enough just to scream at the Occupy Wall Street demonstrations. We need our political system to start reflect this anger back into, 'How do we fix it? How do we get the economy going again?'
author: Colin Powell

quote: The upside to anger? Getting it out of your system. You got to express your anger. Then you have room for more positive things. If I hold something in a long time, and then I speak it, it's amazing how the light shines so much brighter.
author: Reba McEntire

quote: Anger elicits anger, fear elicits fear, no matter how well meaning we may be.
author: Martha Beck

quote: Anger itself does more harm than the condition which aroused anger.
author: David O. Mckay

quote: He who is incapable of feeling strong passions, of being shaken by anger, of living in every sense of the word, will never be a good actor.
author: Sarah Bernhardt

quote: When anger rushes unrestrained to action, like a hot steed, it stumbles on its way. The man of thought strikes deepest and strikes safely.
author: Richard Savage

quote: A fretful temper will divide the closest knot that may be tied, by ceaseless sharp corrosion; a temper passionate and fierce may suddenly your joys disperse at one immense explosion.
author: William Cowper

quote: Whenever you get red in the face, whenever you raise your voice, whenever you get hot under the collar or angry, rebellious or negative in spirit, then know that the spirit of God is leaving you and the spirit of Satan is beginning to take over.
author: Source Unknown

quote: An angry man opens his mouth and shuts his eyes.
author: Cato

quote: I have a right to my anger, and I don't want anybody telling me I shouldn't be, that it's not nice to be, and that something's wrong with me because I get angry.
author: Maxine Waters

quote: Anger rest in the bosom of fools.
author: Bible

quote: Keep cool; anger is not argument.
author: Daniel Webster

quote: The wrath of brothers is fierce and devilish.
author: Proverbs

quote: I guess because I had such a horrible life growing up, going from place to place not knowing what I was gonna do and ending up being homeless, there was a lot of pain and a lot of anger that was coming out through my guitar playing.
author: Dave Mustaine

quote: So I'm not worried about the emotions I carry with me, because I'm happy that I have them; I think it's good for the work I do. The emotions that are not healthy are the ones you hold inside, like anger.
author: Diana Ross

author: Thomas Fuller

quote: Nothing does reason more right, than the coolness of those that offer it: For Truth often suffers more by the heat of its defenders, than from the arguments of its opposers.
author: William Penn

quote: I turned to music originally because of my past and needing a release or an outlet to get out anger or frustration or hurt.
author: Christina Aguilera

quote: ... all his faces were designed to express rage or loathing. Now that something had happened which really deserved a face, he had none to celebrate it with. As a kind of token, he made his Sex Life in Ancient Rome face.
author: Kingsley Amis

quote: Anger is not only inevitable, but it is necessary. For in its place is indifference, the worst of all human qualities.
author: Anonymous

quote: The intoxication of anger, like that of the grape, shows us to others, but hides us from ourselves.
author: John Dryden

quote: What if you threw a protest and no one showed up? The lack of angst and anger and emotion is a big positive.
author: Jay Alan Sekulow

quote: A man that studieth revenge keeps his own wounds green.
author: Francis Bacon

quote: It's a very difficult thing for people to accept, seeing women act out anger on the screen. We're more accustomed to seeing men expressing rage and women crying.
author: Rebecca De Mornay

quote: When I am angry I can pray well and preach well.
author: Martin Luther

quote: As a culture I see us as presently deprived of subtleties. The music is loud, the anger is elevated, sex seems lacking in sweetness and privacy.
author: Shelley Berman

quote: Good satire comes from anger. It comes from a sense of injustice, that there are wrongs in the world that need to be fixed. And what better place to get that well of venom and outrage boiling than a newsroom, because you're on the front lines.
author: Carl Hiaasen

quote: When you learn that a truth is a lie, anger follows.
author: Grace Slick

quote: It is impossible for you to be angry and laugh at the same time. Anger and laughter are mutually exclusive and you have the power to choose either.
author: Wayne Dyer

quote: The preparation, commitment and desire to win will be no less than the last time I drove a grand prix car in anger.
author: Nigel Mansell

quote: Life is precious and there's not a lot of room for anger.
author: Fran Drescher

quote: When angry, count four. When very angry, swear.
author: Mark Twain

quote: Holding on to anger is like grasping a hot coal with the intent of throwing it at someone else; you are the one who gets burned.
author: Gautama Buddha

quote: I did not think that I was angry, but clearly anger was reflected in my writing. I did not think that I had been affected emotionally, but it was clear from my writing that I was still very emotional about the trial some six months after it ended.
author: Christopher Darden

quote: Anger blows out the lamp of the mind. In the examination of a great and important question, everyone should be serene, slow-pulsed and calm.
author: Robert G. Ingersoll

quote: It isn't enough just to scream at the Occupy Wall Street demonstrations. We need our political system to start reflect this anger back into, 'How do we fix it? How do we get the economy going again?'
author: Colin Powell

quote: The upside to anger? Getting it out of your system. You got to express your anger. Then you have room for more positive things. If I hold something in a long time, and then I speak it, it's amazing how the light shines so much brighter.
author: Reba McEntire

quote: Anger elicits anger, fear elicits fear, no matter how well meaning we may be.
author: Martha Beck

quote: Anger itself does more harm than the condition which aroused anger.
author: David O. Mckay

quote: He who is incapable of feeling strong passions, of being shaken by anger, of living in every sense of the word, will never be a good actor.
author: Sarah Bernhardt

quote: When anger rushes unrestrained to action, like a hot steed, it stumbles on its way. The man of thought strikes deepest and strikes safely.
author: Richard Savage

quote: A fretful temper will divide the closest knot that may be tied, by ceaseless sharp corrosion; a temper passionate and fierce may suddenly your joys disperse at one immense explosion.
author: William Cowper

quote: Whenever you get red in the face, whenever you raise your voice, whenever you get hot under the collar or angry, rebellious or negative in spirit, then know that the spirit of God is leaving you and the spirit of Satan is beginning to take over.
author: Source Unknown

quote: An angry man opens his mouth and shuts his eyes.
author: Cato

quote: I have a right to my anger, and I don't want anybody telling me I shouldn't be, that it's not nice to be, and that something's wrong with me because I get angry.
author: Maxine Waters

quote: Anger rest in the bosom of fools.
author: Bible

quote: Keep cool; anger is not argument.
author: Daniel Webster

quote: The wrath of brothers is fierce and devilish.
author: Proverbs

quote: I guess because I had such a horrible life growing up, going from place to place not knowing what I was gonna do and ending up being homeless, there was a lot of pain and a lot of anger that was coming out through my guitar playing.
author: Dave Mustaine

quote: So I'm not worried about the emotions I carry with me, because I'm happy that I have them; I think it's good for the work I do. The emotions that are not healthy are the ones you hold inside, like anger.
author: Diana Ross

quote: Two things a man should never be angry at: what he can help, and what he cannot help.
author: Thomas Fuller

quote: Allowing children to show their guilt, show their grief, show their anger, takes the sting out of the situation.
author: Martha Beck

quote: The worst tempered people I have ever met were those who knew that they were wrong.
author: Wilson Mizner

quote: I have not lost faith in God. I have moments of anger and protest. Sometimes I've been closer to him for that reason.
author: Elie Wiesel

quote: Lawyers are men who hire out their words and anger.
author: Horace

quote: The opposite of anger is not calmness, its empathy.
author: Mehmet Oz

quote: He took over anger to intimidate subordinates, and in time anger took over him.
author: Milan Kundera

quote: All those who offer an opinion on any doubtful point should first clear their minds of every sentiment of dislike, friendship, anger or pity.
author: Sallust

quote: Anger swirled in him a tempest readying her strike. And like a helpless vessel caught in her fury he felt himself dashed against the rocks without mercy.
author: V.S. Carnes

quote: A man is about as big as the things that make him angry.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: Never forget what a man has said to you when he was angry. If he has charged you with anything, you had better look it up.
author: Henry Ward Beecher

quote: Violence in the voice is often only the death rattle of reason in the throat.
author: John F. Boyes

quote: Forgiveness is the economy of the heart... forgiveness saves the expense of anger, the cost of hatred, the waste of spirits.
author: Hannah More

quote: Anger, if not restrained, is frequently more hurtful to us than the injury that provokes it.
author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quote: We're taught to be ashamed of confusion, anger, fear and sadness, and to me they're of equal value to happiness, excitement and inspiration.
author: Alanis Morissette

quote: I may have been the only candidate in America who failed to ride the wave of anti-establishment anger to victory.
author: Mickey Kaus

quote: Nothing does reason more right, than the coolness of those that offer it: For Truth often suffers more by the heat of its defenders, than from the arguments of its opposers.
author: William Penn

quote: I turned to music originally because of my past and needing a release or an outlet to get out anger or frustration or hurt.
author: Christina Aguilera
